nodes.text: An antidote existed for Manax-root poison, a deadly poison derived from the root of the manax tree on Neimoidia. The antidote was administered via subcutaneous injection.

In 22 BBY, Senator Lott Dod poisoned fellow senator, Padmé Amidala with manax-root poison. The antidote for the poison was forcibly taken from Dod by Rush Clovis and administered by Amidala's husband, Anakin Skywalker.
